channel.title: [HELP] NpcDrop Doesn't work
channel.description:
NpcDrop.CFG doesn't work...
Example :
//--------NPCID---------DropType--------Item----Amount-- npcdrop = 86 1 995 5039 [ENDOFNPCDROPLIST]
After that i run the server and i go on it... i killl the Giant Rat and he drop Random item...
What do i do??
Thank you for helping me
(Also i tryed the Search thing on the forum and i found nothing)

item.title: [HELP] NpcDrop Doesn't work
item.dc:creator: @Destroyed_32 Destroyed 32
item.description:
@Destroyed_32 wrote:

Yea… Tryed to Compile the Server? O.o

… If yes, go into your “Item2.java” file, and add a new line like this one:

    public static int NAME[] = { 5039};

BUT! In the code you see “NAME”… There you must put the name of the NPC what you have!

MfG.

Read full topic

item.description:
@baez9 wrote:

Try compiling before runing server?
